language.name: Tosk Albanian
language.maps: Greece and The Former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia

translations.name: SHIB Version
translations.description: In 2007, Shërbimi Informues Biblik (SHIB) produced a text of the New Testament reportedly based on Martin Luther's 1912 version . It was translated into Albanian by Marcel Steiner and edited by Kujtim Drizari, and called Besëlidhja e Re, Zëri i Zotit.

translations.name: Besëlidhja e Re, Zëri i Zotit
